name: NBA 2K14 - Next Gen (PS4 + Xbox One)
description:
NBA 2K14 - Next Gen (PS4 + Xbox One)


Description

NBA 2K13 was a monstrous release for the world's #1 NBA video game franchise, with more than 38 Sports Game of the Year and “Best Of” mentions. NBA 2K14 will raise the bar yet again, providing the best basketball gaming experience for legions of sports fans and gamers around the world. With NBA 2K14 already reviewed as the best basketball game on the market, the next-generation versions a revamped, full with more extra features and additions that make a great game even better. Here are a few features just to get you excited.

 

ECO-MOTION ENGINE - 2K’s ground-breaking, dynamic gameplay engine marries real-life physics, player emotion and deep controls to deliver a seemingly endless variation of actions and reactions that can only be achieved with next-generation technology.

MyCAREER - Experience the NBA life like never before both on and off the court as you develop and hone your MyPLAYER through an epic and immersive branching story mode.

THE PARK - An all-new, massive-multiplayer playground mode where up to 100 MyPLAYERs in a single Park can play street ball, socialize, watch games in progress, and more.

MyGM - A re-imagined franchise mode that takes grabbing the reins of team management to the next level. Create a GM, craft your management style through attributes, manage relationships with players and staff, meet goals set by owners and more in an attempt to earn a championship under your watch.

EXCLUSIVELY ON PS4 - Black Ice Jewelry and PlayStation gear in the VC Store, and a PlayStation Court in The Park.


ORDER YOURS TODAY!!


Price Comparison

EBGAMES - $99.99

OUR PRICE - $89.99

name: Jordan CP3.VII - Gamma Blue/Black/Gym Red/White
description:
Men's Jordan CP3.VII

Gamma Blue/Black/Gym Red/White | Width - D - Medium |


AVAILABILITY ALERT!

Love this shoe? So does everyone else! Due to its overwhelming popularity, we expect it to sell out very quickly. Please be prepared for an immediate sell-through when this shoe launches. Thank you for your understanding.


Description

Chris Paul's seventh signature shoe with Jordan Brand delivers a combination of high-tech performance and aggressive style. The Jordan CP3. VII boasts a leather upper that's accented with Dynamic Flywire technology to provide you with a locked-down, grip-to-the-court fit while the side panels are crafted with perforated details for enhanced breathability. Below the foot sits a lightweight, Phylon midsole that houses an eternal shank to offer a responsive ride and unparalleled support. Lastly, what has become the staple of CP3s line the Podulite cushioning platform that contains hexagonal Zoom units in the forefoot add sprint and underfoot protection. Its also 50 grams lighter than the CP3.VII making it the lightest Chris Paul shoe to date. Wt. 10.8 oz (306g).

name: Nike Hyperdunk 2013 'Purple Dynasty'
description:
Men's Nike Hyperdunk 2013

| Purple Dynasty/Court Purple/Mine Grey/Univ Red | Width - D - Medium |


Description

Show off to your friends, by being the first to get your hands on Nike's Hyperdunk 2013.These sneakers have yet to make their way to Australian shelves. So why not be the first and get yours today!

The Nike Hyperdunk 2013 Men's Basketball Shoes are, in a word, earth-shattering. This lightweight and supportive performance basketball shoe features a combination of Flywire technology and a basketball-specific Lunarlon cushioning system. The Flywire in the upper provides lightweight strength and breathability by using high-strength cables. These cables are designed to be loose when at rest, but dynamic while in motion, tensing to help stabilize the foot. The Lunarlon midsole offers soft and responsive cushioning. The heel features stock-fitted Lunar for a superior fit. A reinforced tongue top and collar creates additional stability. A 3-D shaped, glass-reinforced, composite midfoot shank offers torsional rigidity and responsiveness. The solid rubber outsole provides great durability and traction. Wt. 12.1 oz. (340g).


Features

  • UPPER: Synthetic and mesh with exposed Dynamic Flywire
  • MIDSOLE: Full-length Lunarlon cushioning
  • OUTSOLE: Solid rubber with modified traction pattern

| Green Glow/Mineral Teal/Laser Orange | Width - D - Medium |


AVAILABILITY ALERT!

Love this shoe? So does everyone else! Due to its overwhelming popularity, we expect it to sell out very quickly. Please be prepared for an immediate sell-through when this shoe launches. Thank you for your understanding.

Description

The Nike Kobe 8 System basketball shoe is designed to fit like an extension of Kobe's foot for a quick first step. Engineered mesh upper provides a dynamic, ultra-lightweight fit that moves with the foot and offers 360º of breathability. Phylon™ midsole delivers lightweight comfort and stability. Full-length Lunarlon midsole insert adds lightweight cushioning that sits lower internally to offer better stability. One-millimeter rubber outsole combines a classic herringbone pattern with a snake scale-inspired traction pattern. Uses less rubber than traditional outsoles for lightweight durability and excellent multi-surface traction. The 3-D anatomical heel counter provides a sleek, locked down fit. Wt. 9.6 oz (272g).


Features

  • Upper Height: Low

  • Cushioning: Phylon Midsole

description:
Men's Nike Hyper Quickness

Purple Dynasty/University Red | Width - D - Medium |


Description

Combining comfort and high-performance features, the Nike Hyper Quickness can elevate your play. Hyperfuse upper reduces weight and enhances airflow, keeping your feet light, cool, and dry. The midfoot harness secures your foot, allowing you to confidently showcase your athleticism. Featuring high-midfoot rubber wrapping, the Phylon™ midsole delivers long-lasting durability, carrying your game throughout four quarters and into overtime. Forefront Nike Zoom unit provides responsiveness, adding bounce to your step. Pure rubber outsole with a modified herringbone pattern provides ideal on-court traction, helping you blow past defenders. Wt. 10.4 oz (295g).


Features 

  • UPPER: Hyperfuse

name: Nike LeBron Zoom Soldier VII - Black/Bright Crimson/Dark Grey
description:
Men's Nike LeBron Zoom Soldier VII

| Black/Bright Crimson/Dark Grey#160;| Width - D - Medium |


Description

They say that the shoes don't make the player, the player makes the shoes. But, three time MVP, LeBron James, even knows that the Men's Nike Zoom Soldier VII Shoes have what it takes to give you the extra function and style boost you need to enhance your hoops game.

Featuring a Hyperfuse constructed upper for lightweight durability and breathability, this technology will keep you fully supported. Also contributing to their security is the mid foot strap and inner sleeve for extra protection and a lock-down feel.

Game players will also notice how extremely flexible they are, thanks to the power flex outsole that allows for feet to be used more like a lever for extra power. It's flexible, but not too flexible that you can't get the responsiveness that's needed for ultimate victory. Wt. 12.9 oz (365g).


Features

  • UPPER: Hyperfuse with midfoot strap and innersleeve
  • MIDSOLE: Faceted Phylon with Nike Zoom unit in the forefront and heel
  • OUTSOLE: Power flex

Dual-inspired by the Japanese rising sun flag and a 19th century women's fashion shoe, these simple yet sleek Jordans dropped in 1996. The black and white color way with hints of gold make these a must.

name: Jordan Melo M9 - Cargo Khaki/Gym Red/Black/Metallic Zinc
description:
Men's Jordan Melo M9

Cargo Khaki/Gym Red/Black/Metallic Zinc | Width - D - Medium |


Description

Jordan Brand jumps into 2013 with the 9th chapter in the Melo saga. They envisioned a performance shoe with many layers that function individually but all work in harmony to create one holistic, strong fit. The end result is the Jordan Melo M9. The upper starts with a formfitting bootie that operates with interweaving layers of supportive synthetic materials and dynamic Flywire cables for maximum lockdown on all sides. To add to the supportive upper, this shoe incorporates an outsole that evolved from its predecessor, the Melo M8. It features the same performance details like a segmented heel, articulated crash zones, and shank support; however, it's updated with a low-profile Zoom bag forefoot unit that extends out 1.5 millimeters to increase cushioning and responsiveness. It also adds a maximum-volume Zoom bag unit in the heel for impact protection and a solid rubber outsole for dependable on-court traction. In the end, this shoe is an ideal combination of layers working together to deliver protection and articulation, while eliminating bulkiness which often restricts movement and a player's performance. wt. 14.2 oz (400g).


Features

  • UPPER: Combination mesh and leather fused with Nike Flywire technology
  • MIDSOLE: Exposed Zoom Air unit in the heel
  • OUTSOLE: Solid rubber outsole with flex grooves

name: Jordan 6 Rings - Black/Varsity Maize/Cool Grey/Gamma
description:
Men's Jordan 6 Rings 'Bel-Air'

Black/Varsity Maize/Cool Grey/Gamma | Width - D - Medium |


Description

The Jordan 6 Rings incorporates key features from each shoe that MJ wore while stacking up the Championship rings for the Chicago Bulls. Celebrate the history of Jordan with this hybrid design that takes its cues from six legendary Jordan shoe styles. It's made with a full-grain leather, synthetic leather and engineered mesh upper, with details like the lacelock and heel loop from the Jordan VI, a huarache-style inner sock from the Jordan VII and a fuzzy tongue logo and VELCRO brand fastener from the Jordan VIII. The midsole, a full-length Phylon unit with Zoom Air™ in the heel and forefoot, was inspired by the Jordan XIII. The entire upper silhouette gets its design from the Jordan XI while the "TWO3" script on the tongue and metal lace loops on top are taken from the Jordan XII. The outsole is a combination of solid and clear rubber, which created performance traction with superior style. Wt. 14.8 oz (420g).


Features

  • Upper Height: Mid
  • Upper Material: Full-Grain Leather, Mesh, Synthetic Leather
  • Cushioning: Phylon Midsole, Zoom Air

description:
Men's Jordan Superfly II

| Varsity Maize/Game Royal/Gamma Blue | Width - D - Medium |


Description

There are no limits in the Men's Jordan Superfly II Basketball Shoes. Featuring a three-layer composite Hyperfuse upper, this lightweight shoe offers you the fit and the feel you need to challenge any opponent on the court with ease.

Featuring a durable, three layer construction in the upper ensures that this basketball shoe offers plenty of ventilation, durability and stability in all the right places. The Nike Zoom units in the heel and forefoot, along with advanced Lunarlon cushioning, give your feet plenty of springy cushioning and support. The advanced design is created in such a way that it complements your foot's anatomy for a superior, personalized fit. A reinforced toe provides extra durability, while padding that conforms to the foot provides specialized traction for speedy bursts in any direction. 

Stay light on your feet in these limitless basketball shoes. Wt. 12.9oz (365g)

name: Jordan CP3.VII 'Nitro Green'
description:
Men's Jordan CP3.VII 'Nitro Green'

Electric Green/Metallic Silver/Black | Width - D - Medium |


AVAILABILITY ALERT!

Love this shoe? So does everyone else! Due to its overwhelming popularity, we expect it to sell out very quickly. Please be prepared for an immediate sell-through when this shoe launches. Thank you for your understanding.


Description

Chris Paul's seventh signature shoe with Jordan Brand delivers a combination of high-tech performance and aggressive style. The Jordan CP3. VII boasts a leather upper that's accented with Dynamic Flywire technology to provide you with a locked-down, grip-to-the-court fit while the side panels are crafted with perforated details for enhanced breathability. Below the foot sits a lightweight, Phylon midsole that houses an eternal shank to offer a responsive ride and unparalleled support. Lastly, what has become the staple of CP3s line the Podulite cushioning platform that contains hexagonal Zoom units in the forefoot add sprint and underfoot protection. Its also 50 grams lighter than the CP3.VII making it the lightest Chris Paul shoe to date. Wt. 10.8 oz (306g).

name: Nike Hyperdunk 2013 - Blue Hero/Wolf Grey/Dark Grey
description:
Men's Nike Hyperdunk 2013

| Blue Hero/Wolf Grey/Dark Grey | Width - D - Medium |


Description

Show off to your friends, by being the first to get your hands on Nike's Hyperdunk 2013.These sneakers have yet to make their way to Australian shelves. So why not be the first and get yours today!

The Nike Hyperdunk 2013 Men's Basketball Shoes are, in a word, earth-shattering. This lightweight and supportive performance basketball shoe features a combination of Flywire technology and a basketball-specific Lunarlon cushioning system. The Flywire in the upper provides lightweight strength and breathability by using high-strength cables. These cables are designed to be loose when at rest, but dynamic while in motion, tensing to help stabilize the foot. The Lunarlon midsole offers soft and responsive cushioning. The heel features stock-fitted Lunar for a superior fit. A reinforced tongue top and collar creates additional stability. A 3-D shaped, glass-reinforced, composite midfoot shank offers torsional rigidity and responsiveness. The solid rubber outsole provides great durability and traction. Wt. 12.1 oz. (340g).


Features

  • UPPER: Synthetic and mesh with exposed Dynamic Flywire
  • MIDSOLE: Full-length Lunarlon cushioning
  • OUTSOLE: Solid rubber with modified traction pattern

name: Nike Air Max Hyperposite 'Pop Art'
description:
Men's Nike Air Max Hyperposite

| Hyper Blue/Obsidian/Total Crimson | Width - D - Medium |


Description

The Nike Air Max Hyperposite is the first Foamposite basketball shoe with 360 Max Air® cushioning. The Hyperfuse upper is a combination of PU-based Foamposite material, performance synthetic and mesh that creates a lightweight yet durable shoe. The strategically-placed Foamposite provides support for long-lasting wear and protection from the elements. One-piece textile composite tongue with half inner sleeve for a snug, comfortable fit. Cutouts on the midfoot expose the mesh for extra ventilation. An articulated collar also works to provide flexibility with lateral stability for the ankle and heel. The collar is also cushioned around the heel for added comfort. Inside, a full-length injected Phylon™ midsole gives a lightweight, comfortable ride. The basketball-specific Max Air® 360 unit increases stability. Data-informed foot mapping makes the outsole really shine, with more traction in high-contact areas but less in low-contact regions. This helps minimize the weight with maximized performance. The outrigger provides stability, especially during hard cuts and quick stops. Solid rubber provides durability and traction on a variety of surfaces. Wt. 16.9 oz (480g).


Features

  • Upper Height: Mid
  • Cushioning: Max Air 360

Featuring a durable, three layer construction in the upper ensures that this basketball shoe offers plenty of ventilation, durability and stability in all the right places. The Nike Zoom units in the heel and forefoot, along with advanced Lunarlon cushioning, give your feet plenty of springy cushioning and support. The advanced design is created in such a way that it complements your foot's anatomy for a superior, personalized fit. A reinforced toe provides extra durability, while padding that conforms to the foot provides specialized traction for speedy bursts in any direction. 

Stay light on your feet in these limitless basketball shoes. Wt. 12.9oz (365g)

name: Under Armour Anatomix Spawn - Blaze Orange/Garnet/Steeltown Gold/Gravel/Black
description:
Men's Under Armour Anatomix Spawn

| Blaze Orange/Garnet/Steeltown Gold/Gravel/Black | Width - D - Medium |


Description

The Under Armour Anatomix Spawn is a basketball shoe designed for lightweight performance and natural support. Interwoven layers of flexgear in the upper are designed around the muscles, ligaments, and tendons of the foot to provide a natural fit and lightweight support. Exposed mesh areas provide zone-specific breathability. A full-length Micro-G midsole is cored-out in specific areas to reduce weight and allow natural flexibility. A TPU shank extends from the forefoot to the heel and wraps the lateral side for greater stability. A molded Micro-G sockliner molds to your foot for form-fitting comfort. Textured rubber and herringbone pods provide traction. Wt. 12.5 oz (354g).


Features 

  • UPPER: Exposed mesh and synthetic materials
  • MIDSOLE: Micro G Cushioning, TPU shank
  • OUTSOLE: Combination clear ice rubber and herringbone traction pods

Featuring a Hyperfuse upper with leather overlays placed in key zones, the Jordan Prime.Fly delivers a lightweight, supportive fit that helps you feel confident in and out of the game. Below the foot is a Phylon midsole that contains Nike Zoom units in addition to an external shank for lightweight cushioning and added stability. A rubber outsole features a basketball-specific traction pattern that supplies grip with each stride. Wt. 12.1 oz (343g).

Featuring a Hyperfuse constructed upper for lightweight durability and breathability, this technology will keep you fully supported. Also contributing to their security is the mid foot strap and inner sleeve for extra protection and a lock-down feel.

Reebok is back with another basketball banger in the form of the Men's Reebok Shaqnosis Basketball Shoes. name: Jordan Melo M9 - Team Orange/White/Total Orange
description:
Men's Jordan Melo M9

Team Orange/White/Total Orange | Width - D - Medium |


Description

Jordan Brand jumps into 2013 with the 9th chapter in the Melo saga. They envisioned a performance shoe with many layers that function individually but all work in harmony to create one holistic, strong fit. The end result is the Jordan Melo M9. The upper starts with a formfitting bootie that operates with interweaving layers of supportive synthetic materials and dynamic Flywire cables for maximum lockdown on all sides. To add to the supportive upper, this shoe incorporates an outsole that evolved from its predecessor, the Melo M8. It features the same performance details like a segmented heel, articulated crash zones, and shank support; however, it's updated with a low-profile Zoom bag forefoot unit that extends out 1.5 millimeters to increase cushioning and responsiveness. It also adds a maximum-volume Zoom bag unit in the heel for impact protection and a solid rubber outsole for dependable on-court traction. In the end, this shoe is an ideal combination of layers working together to deliver protection and articulation, while eliminating bulkiness which often restricts movement and a player's performance. wt. 14.2 oz (400g).


Features

  • UPPER: Combination mesh and leather fused with Nike Flywire technology
  • MIDSOLE: Exposed Zoom Air unit in the heel
  • OUTSOLE: Solid rubber outsole with flex grooves

Men's Jordan Melo M9

Black/Black/Squadron Green | Width - D - Medium |


Description

Jordan Brand jumps into 2013 with the 9th chapter in the Melo saga. They envisioned a performance shoe with many layers that function individually but all work in harmony to create one holistic, strong fit. The end result is the Jordan Melo M9. The upper starts with a formfitting bootie that operates with interweaving layers of supportive synthetic materials and dynamic Flywire cables for maximum lockdown on all sides. To add to the supportive upper, this shoe incorporates an outsole that evolved from its predecessor, the Melo M8. It features the same performance details like a segmented heel, articulated crash zones, and shank support; however, it's updated with a low-profile Zoom bag forefoot unit that extends out 1.5 millimeters to increase cushioning and responsiveness. It also adds a maximum-volume Zoom bag unit in the heel for impact protection and a solid rubber outsole for dependable on-court traction. In the end, this shoe is an ideal combination of layers working together to deliver protection and articulation, while eliminating bulkiness which often restricts movement and a player's performance. wt. 14.2 oz (400g).


Features

  • UPPER: Combination mesh and leather fused with Nike Flywire technology
  • MIDSOLE: Exposed Zoom Air unit in the heel
  • OUTSOLE: Solid rubber outsole with flex grooves

name: Adidas adiPure Crazyquick - Blast Emerald/Blast Purple/White
description:
Men's Adidas adiPure Crazyquick

| Blast Emerald/Blast Purple/White | Width - D - Medium |


Description

 

Built to support basketball-specific movements, the adidas adiPure Crazyquick offers a versatile design to help take your game to the next level. This high-performance basketball shoe features a four-way stretch, Lycra based upper, which enhances flexibility, allowing quick cuts and fast directional changes. Bonding pill shapes and allowing stretch without delamination, an innovative printing process provides supportive style and long-lasting durability. High-density printing areas offer support while, low-density printing areas maximize flex. Reducing skin strain caused by sudden, intense movements, these printing areas deliver ultimate on-court maneuverability. 3D molded collar and new heel notch design maintain a comfortable, secure fit. Woven polyester webbing extends from the lacing to the SprintFrame, providing support without restricting natural movement. Wrapping over the tip and sides of the midsole, the 3D molded toecap protects your foot. The molded EVA midsole with SprintFrame helps stabilize your foot and adapts to your motion. Outsole with rubber pods offers ideal on-court traction. Wt. 11.25 oz (318g).


Features

  • WEIGHT: 11.25oz (318g)
  • UPPER: Mesh and leather
  • MIDSOLE: SPRINTFRAME and PUREMOTION
  • OUTSOLE: Rubber with flex grooves

name: Jordan Superfly Low - Black/White/Deep Royal Blue/Laser Purple
description:
Men's Jordan Superfly Low

Black/White/Deep Royal Blue/Laser Purple | Width - D - Medium |


Description

The Super.Fly has now evolved into a low-cut option. The Jordan Super.Fly Low is a premier shoe with the latest Nike technology. The Hyperfuse upper is made of a combination of performance fabrics for a lightweight and supportive fit. An injected Phylon midsole houses a Lunarlon forefoot inset, encapsulated Air-Sole heel unit, and external TPU shank, which all work together to create a lightweight yet ultra-durable court experience. A rubber outsole sits below for traction to help you cut around your competition. Wt. 12.9 oz (365g).


Features 

  • UPPER: Synthetic and mesh with cutouts for ventilation
  • MIDSOLE: Lunarlon midsole with Nike Zoom unit
  • OUTSOLE: Durable rubber

name: Nike Hyper Quickness - Black/Team Orange/Photo Blue
description:
Men's Nike Hyper Quickness

Black/Team Orange/Photo Blue | Width - D - Medium |


Description

Combining comfort and high-performance features, the Nike Hyper Quickness can elevate your play. Hyperfuse upper reduces weight and enhances airflow, keeping your feet light, cool, and dry. The midfoot harness secures your foot, allowing you to confidently showcase your athleticism. Featuring high-midfoot rubber wrapping, the Phylon™ midsole delivers long-lasting durability, carrying your game throughout four quarters and into overtime. Forefront Nike Zoom unit provides responsiveness, adding bounce to your step. Pure rubber outsole with a modified herringbone pattern provides ideal on-court traction, helping you blow past defenders. Wt. 10.4 oz (295g).


Features 

  • UPPER: Hyperfuse
  • MIDSOLE: Phylon and Nike Zoom
  • OUTSOLE: Rubber with herringbone pattern

Description

Combining comfort and high-performance features, the Nike Hyper Quickness can elevate your play. Hyperfuse upper reduces weight and enhances airflow, keeping your feet light, cool, and dry. The midfoot harness secures your foot, allowing you to confidently showcase your athleticism. Featuring high-midfoot rubber wrapping, the Phylon™ midsole delivers long-lasting durability, carrying your game throughout four quarters and into overtime. Forefront Nike Zoom unit provides responsiveness, adding bounce to your step. Pure rubber outsole with a modified herringbone pattern provides ideal on-court traction, helping you blow past defenders. Wt. 10.4 oz (295g).

name: Nike Free Flyknit + - Rainbow
description:
Men's Nike Free Flyknit +

Rainbow | Width - D - Medium |


Description

The revolution of Flyknit continues in the Nike Free Flyknit+ Men's Running Shoe, combining the second-skin fit of Flyknit construction and ultimate flexibility of Nike Free.

The revolutionary Nike Flyknit upper delivers a compressive, second-skin fit that secures your foot over the Nike Free midsole. Made entirely of polyester yarn, the one-piece upper seamlessly integrates areas of high breathability, stretch and support where you need it most.

The upper, midsole and outsole work together to create a more natural ride. For ultimate flexibility, the shoe's Nike Free 5.0 midsole features flex grooves to promote natural motion and help increase stability and foot strength.

Ultra-light Flywire cables are woven into the Flyknit upper and connect to the laces, offering a dynamic, supportive fit that adapts to your foot's movements.

The FREE Flyknit offers a truly revolutionary fit. For optimal performance, we recommend a true-to-size fit, but personal preference may require you to move up a half size. Wt. 7.8 oz (221g).


Features

  • UPPER: Flyknit; polyester yarn
  • MIDSOLE: Free 5.0; phylon
  • OUTSOLE: Rubber
  • WEIGHT: 7.8 ounces (men's size 10)
  • Nike+ ready

The revolutionary Nike Flyknit upper delivers a compressive, second-skin fit that secures your foot over the Nike Free midsole. Made entirely of polyester yarn, the one-piece upper seamlessly integrates areas of high breathability, stretch and support where you need it most.

The upper, midsole and outsole work together to create a more natural ride. For ultimate flexibility, the shoe's Nike Free 5.0 midsole features flex grooves to promote natural motion and help increase stability and foot strength.

Ultra-light Flywire cables are woven into the Flyknit upper and connect to the laces, offering a dynamic, supportive fit that adapts to your foot's movements.

The FREE Flyknit offers a truly revolutionary fit. For optimal performance, we recommend a true-to-size fit, but personal preference may require you to move up a half size. Wt. 7.8 oz (221g).


Features

  • UPPER: Flyknit; polyester yarn
  • MIDSOLE: Free 5.0; phylon
  • OUTSOLE: Rubber
  • WEIGHT: 7.8 ounces (men's size 10)
  • Nike+ ready

name: Nike Flyknit Lunar 1 + - Dark Grey/Black/Game Royal
description:
Men's Nike Flyknit Lunar 1 +

| Dark Grey/Black/Game Royal | Width - D - Medium |


Description

 

Designed for runners with a neutral gait, the Nike Flyknit Lunar 1+ is an ultra-lightweight running shoe that delivers a dynamic fit with an excellent blend of cushioning and support. A one-piece upper with knit construction is made of polyester yarns that seamlessly integrate areas of high breathability, stretch, and support where you need it most. Flywire technology is ultra-lightweight, customizable through the laces, and wraps the foot for a dynamic fit. Low-profile knit tongue adds ventilation and comfort. Fitsole sockliner conforms to the shape of your foot, providing comfort and underfoot support. Pull-tab on the heel allows for easy on and off. Reflective elements remain visible in low-light conditions. Lunarlon cushioning system features a soft, yet resilient foam core that works with a supportive, bottomless foam carrier to provide support and plush, responsive cushioning. The firmer carrier foam core offers lightweight, springy response. Duralon blown rubber forefoot lugs deliver cushioning and helps encourage a more efficient, natural range of motion through toe-off. Flex groves add enhanced articulation flexibility, and a smooth transition. BRS 1000™ carbon rubber along the heel contact zone gives maximum abrasion resistance and long-wearing durability. Wt. 8.4 oz (238g).
